I tell you what, though... This game blows me friggin away.  Rockin an i7 920 stock speed with GTX 260 superclocked at 626mhz on Win 7 x64 RC.  1680x1050 @ very high settings.  THIS IS THE REASON I BUILT MY NEW COMPUTER.  Speifically for this game.  It was worth every penny.  Photorealistic graphics smooth as silk.   I am so happy I could shit myself.
I can't believe I am playing Crysis at very high settings and I don't even have to OC my i7.  Joy.

I've got Win 7 64 bit, but i tried this and running in vista SP2 compatibility mode but i still end up with a black screen. any ideas? and exactly which .exe am i aupposed to be running in comp mode, cause theres like 4

FOR W7 64-BIT USERS: Apply the crack, then start the 64-bit version of the game by running the Crysis.exe in the Bin64 folder. NOT Crysis64.exe. If you do this, it should run flawlessly.

It may be worth noting that before I did this I set both Crysis.exe and Crysis64.exe to Vista SP2 compatibility mode with admin privileges, but that may not be necessary.

Hey fuckers, I got it to work. Like someone else said:

Go to Bin64
Right-click on crysis.exe after replacing it
Go to compatibility  > Vista (service pack 2)
Also check run as administrator

Worked.
